Acerca de este producto
‚úî Tenga la seguridad de comprar. ‚úî La mini motosierra con bater√≠a resuelve completamente el problema del humo del motor y la duraci√≥n de la bater√≠a en el mercado. Garant√≠a ilimitada de dos a√±os en Alemania.
üçÇ„ÄêMINI MOTOSIERRA AHORRA TIEMPO Y ESFUERZO„Äë¬øTodav√≠a te preocupa decorar tu jard√≠n? Con la motosierra inal√°mbrica Seesii, no tiene que quitar ramas durante meses como lo har√≠a con una sierra convencional. Los objetivos en jardines, patios y bosques se pueden cortar r√°pidamente en el entorno de le√±ador. Es m√°s eficiente, m√°s liviano, m√°s duradero y puede ser utilizado por principiantes, mujeres y personas mayores por igual.
üçÇ„ÄêCORTE ALTAMENTE EFICIENTE„ÄëEsta mini motosierra de 6 pulgadas est√° equipada con lubricaci√≥n de tanque de aceite. La cadena se puede lubricar autom√°ticamente, lo que reduce la resistencia a la fricci√≥n de la cadena cuando se usa la sierra el√©ctrica y proporciona un corte suave. El potente motor de cobre puro de 800 W tiene una velocidad de hasta 7 m/s. Se tarda unos 5 segundos en cortar un tronco de 4 pulgadas de di√°metro, como cortar mantequilla.
üçÇ„ÄêDURACI√ìN EXCEPCIONAL DE LA BATER√çA„Äë Sabemos que la duraci√≥n de la bater√≠a de la sierra inal√°mbrica es su principal preocupaci√≥n. Nuestra motosierra est√° equipada con dos bater√≠as de 21V 4000mAh, que pueden cortar m√°s de 100 piezas de madera de forma continua. La protecci√≥n contra sobrecalentamiento y sobretemperatura garantiza una vida √∫til de la bater√≠a mucho m√°s larga. El indicador de estado de la bater√≠a se encuentra en la bater√≠a para verificar f√°cilmente el nivel de carga.
üçÇ„ÄêM√ÅS SEGURIDAD Y MENOS RUIDO„ÄëEsta mini motosierra con bater√≠a tiene un interruptor de bloqueo de seguridad y un protector contra salpicaduras. Para evitar un arranque accidental, el bloqueo de seguridad y el gatillo deben presionarse simult√°neamente para arrancar la sierra. El protector contra salpicaduras evita que el aserr√≠n salpique durante el trabajo. El ruido es muy bajo para que no tengas que preocuparte por molestar a tus vecinos.
üçÇ„ÄêF√ÅCIL MANTENIMIENTO„ÄëCon certificaci√≥n UL/CE/FCC/ETL, esta mini motosierra se puede utilizar durante muchos a√±os. Son m√°s f√°ciles de almacenar y m√°s baratos de mantener. Un simple afilado de cadena y una botella de aceite de barra generalmente mantendr√°n una sierra en funcionamiento durante a√±os. El mejor regalo para familiares y amigos amantes del bricolaje.
üçÇ„ÄêACCESORIOS AMISTOSOS„Äë - Hemos preparado 2 x Bater√≠a, 1 x Maleta, 2 x Cadena (una ha sido instalada), 1 x Gu√≠as, 1 x Cargador, 1 x Guantes, 1 x Gafas, 1 x Cubierta protectora, 1 x Manual de usuario y 1 x Destornillador para usted, estos son los equipos m√°s importantes que puede necesitar en el paquete de mini motosierra.

El sistema de tensado de cadena en el primer uso se me desenrosc√≥ el tornillo y se perdi√≥, suerte que es un tornillo estandard y pude poner otro, creo que tendr√≠an que revisar el sistema de tensado de cadena para que sea m√°s seguro. Excelente manejo
Revisado en Espa√±a el 16 de diciembre de 2023
Tama√±o: 6 PulgadasCompra verificada
 Es s√∫per c√≥moda, las bater√≠as me suelen durar aproximadamente unos 40/45 minutos. La estoy usando para cortar/podar en una parcela con m√°s de 80 √°rboles frutales y en el jard√≠n, se lo come todo. Es muy ligera. Como actualmente es muy complicado pedir permisos para hacer quemas de podas, me va muy bien para seleccionar que troncos cortar para cuando tenga que hacer alguna barbacoa. Viene muy completa, 2 bater√≠as, un juego de guantes , unas gafas de protecci√≥n, 2 espadas, 2 cadenas. En mi caso soy particular, no me dedico a esto, pero...
La recomiendo, por lo √∫til, f√°cil de usar y lo completa que viene por 85‚Ç¨, no me esperaba que fuera a ir tan bien. Vi unos v√≠deos en Youtube y la pon√≠an como una de las 10 mejores. Espero que a alguien le sirva mi rese√±a. ( No voy a comisi√≥n üòú ) ojal√° üòî

Claude le bienvenu
mini scie a chaine

Traducir rese√±a a Espa√±ol
Jim Matthews
Updated to a positive review
Revisado en Canad√° el 14 de julio de 2022
Compra verificada
Update (8/19/22): Seesii customer service reached out to me and sent me an updated version of the saw with the thermal cut-off issue fixed. If they are now shipping this updated version of the saws to customers, I can attest that after an hour or so of heavy use, the saw seems to operate properly. It's light, it cuts well, it's the right tool for pruning trees and cutting brush.

Original review:
First off, I've been cutting firewood for many years - I own several chainsaws as well as a cordless polesaw. I say this to establish that I know what I'm doing.

I'm cleaning up a bunch of brush around the house and I figured this would be perfect for trimming branches. And it was for the first 10 minutes or so! After cutting a few dozen 1-2 inch branches (stopping periodically to manually oil the chain), it suddenly shut off. I figure that the thermal protection triggered (which is weird, because I didn't overwork it at all). After letting it cool down for 20 minutes or so, I restarted but didn't get through more than 2-3 branches before the same thing happened again. It got progressively worse until it wouldn't cut more than one branch without shutting off. I had to finish the job with a pair of manual garden pruners.

I tried switching the batteries and I let it cool down (note that it was a cool, overcast day and I wasn't over-working the tool). Maybe I got a lemon, but other reviews have mentioned the same thing and I think it might be a design flaw.
Leer m√°s
A 17 personas les ha parecido esto √∫til
Denunciar
Traducir rese√±a a Espa√±ol
rlbuzz
One of the handiest gadgets ever!
Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 5 de abril de 2022
Compra verificada
I've seen hand held chain saws for a while and have always thought they might be handy to own, but I was just blown away with the performance of this little saw. Now I don't expect it to do the job of a large chain saw, but for use on pruning and cutting down small bushes, shrubs and even some medium branches on tree, it's been excellent.
My main reasons for choosing the Seesii Cordless Chainsaw are many. First it's size. The six inch cutting bar allows this saw to be used on even medium branches, making it far more useful than the smaller four inch versions. Second, a big addition is that is actually has a chain oiler. This is a huge advantage and will prevent excessive wear of both the chain bar and the chain itself. I don't think I've ever seen this feature offered on any of the competitive units. Third, it has a spring loaded upper bar guard. This helps deflect chippings from the saw, but it's main purpose is to provide some protection from the upper rotating chain. Many competitors do not include this. Fourth, it has a carrying case included. Most of the similar units do not offer this and it's a very nice feature to include a case for keeping all of your accessories, such as battery charger, both batteries, spare chain, screwdriver for adjusting chain tension, as well as the saw itself all in a convenient easy to carry plastic case. You can take everything you need with you as you start your various jobs around the house and then use it to keep everything together when you aren't using your saw. Great accessory!
After charging both batteries I decided to give it a try and was amazed at just how easy to use and how powerful it actually was. I started doing just a little general pruning on various trees and bushes and then advanced to the removal of two old Dwarf Alberto Spruce that had grown to over 6 feet tall. The saw quickly dispatched all of the branches on the first shrub as well as cutting the main trunk (about 4") into three pieces. I then went on to do the same to the second shrub, all on the same batter charge, and it's still running strong. I honestly didn't expect this kind of performance on a single battery.
The saw has made jobs such as this so much easier than it would have been using either a hand saw or even a lopping blade. I can already tell that this will be one of my handiest tools to have around the house and garden. I generally refrain from product reviews, but in the case of this item, I decided it was worthy of the time and effort to give my quick review of my experiences with it.

A 36 personas les ha parecido esto √∫til
